title: Yosemite National Park: Webcams
body: Webcams                       Yosemite Falls Yosemite Falls, a combination of Upper Yosemite Fall, Middle Cascades, and Lower Yosemite Fall, has a total height of 2,425 feet. In May, you may see Pacific dogwood in bloom just below the waterfall. A streaming version of this view is also available.You can help support this webcam and provide for the future of Yosemite by becoming a Friend of Yosemite today.   View webcam                              Half Dome This view of Yosemite Valley from just east of Yosemite Village gives a sense of conditions of the floor of Yosemite Valley. You can help support this webcam and provide for the future of Yosemite by becoming a Friend of Yosemite today.   View webcam                              Yosemite High Sierra This webcam, located at about 8,000 feet in elevation, shows Half Dome and the surrounding high country. (View a key of the peaks.)You can help support this webcam and provide for the future of Yosemite by becoming a Friend of Yosemite today.   View webcam                              El Capitan Located on a dome near the Wawona Tunnel, this webcam provides a nice view of Yosemite Valley.You can help support this webcam and provide for the future of Yosemite by becoming a Friend of Yosemite today.   View webcam                              Tuolumne Meadows  Yosemite Hospitality operates a webcam at the Tuolumne Meadows Store, giving you a glimpse into the high country during the summer. The prominent dome in the distance is Fairview Dome.   View webcam                              Turtleback Dome & Air Quality This air quality camera shows the view to the west from near Yosemite Valley and also displays current air quality and weather data>.   View webcam                              Yosemite Ski & Snowboard Area (formerly Badger Pass Ski Area) Yosemite Hospitality operates a webcam at the Yosemite Ski & Snowboard Area (formerly Badger Pass Ski Area) so you can check out conditions and see the skiers and snowboarders.    View webcam              The US Geological Survey also maintains a webcam at Happy Isles. (This webcam is temporarily not available on this web page.)
